Text:
If it was a normal occurrence for me to come home & find my girlfriend zapping the shit out of some naked slut she has swinging around in a tiny little cage, or maybe slapping a tied up naked hottie in the face & yelling at her for not licking her asshole right. And she doesnt do this stuff to make me happy or nothing she does it b/c it gets her jollies off.
Yea, a few years of that & I'd be like gosh I really dont need the other 6 decades I probably have left to live. I'm good to go right here.
